## Excerpt from README

A sharpest theme from `@gleich` ported to obsidian.

N/A

## Criteria

| Criteria                       | Status                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| :----------------------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Dark/Light mode support        | Dark mode only with WIP light mode                                                                                                                                                                                           |

| Value Propositions             | A sharpest theme from @gleich ported to obsidian.                                                                                                                                                                            |
